messages.message:
do we have an environment variable for distinguishing aihub vs non-aihub environments?

i think all of the routing changes were made directly (ie there’s no logic for checking an environment variable to change the routing for ai hub environments)

so i think the fastest solution would be to just change the error page completely (which would be consistent with how we’ve changed `server-nginx` and `apps-server` )
i think there was talk of adding an env var, but never did and other feature specific flags were put in place instead
i would not be opposed to adding one though. Surprised e made it this far without it

we’ll definitely need to add one when we merge everything into master, but for the sake of not introducing too many changes right before launch, i think the env var can wait

definitely agree the error page should be fixed before launch though!
